name: Shopify  Apps Store Graphics
description:
A handy template for creating and storing icons, banners, or screenshots for your Shopify App.

  • all the graphics templates you need for Shopify app store
  • links to guidelines
  • text with official recommendations added next to each item
  • check how your banners and icons will look in the store. Preview of the desktop and mobile Shopify app store
